description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Mobile Broadband driver denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43555):

1. Identify the relevant update KB dependent on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: Install KB5044284
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: Install KB5044285
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: Install KB5044285
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: Install KB5044280
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: Install KB5044273
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: Install KB5044273
   - For 32-bit systems, use KB5044273 as well.

2. Download the corresponding update package from the official catalog using the following links:
   - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

3. After downloading, install the updates and restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- This set of updates resolves the out-of-bounds read vulnerability, mitigating potential denial of service incidents.
- Please ensure your system is compatible with the chosen update version.
- It's advisable to back up critical data before proceeding with installation.
